snippet: A shy 28-year-old from South Central, Yolanda Manuel makes a meager living as a public school cafeteria worker. Yet anytime she clears her throat to speak these days, television news crews rush to capture her every word.    In the past few weeks, ...
lead_paragraph: A shy 28-year-old from South Central, Yolanda Manuel makes a meager living as a public school cafeteria worker. Yet anytime she clears her throat to speak these days, television news crews rush to capture her every word. In the past few weeks, Ms. Manuel has become another sad symbol of every parent's worst nightmare and of a mother's grim determination to protect her child, even after death.
abstract: Yolanda Manuel, 28-year-old South Central Los Angeles resident is on crusade to make it crime for anyone who witnesses child molestation to fail to report it; is seeking trial for 19-year-old David Cash, whose best friend Jeremy Strohmeyer raped and murdered her seven-year-old daughter Sherrice Iverson in 1997; says Cash witnessed initial stages of attack but failed to seek help; photo (M)
